title: Liberia: Ex-VP Jewel Howard-Taylor to Address High-Level Women’s Leadership Forum in Burkina Faso
description:
The former Vice President has expressed appreciation for the invitation and reaffirmed her commitment to advancing initiatives that uplift women and promote sustainable economic growth across Africa.

title: Qatar Chamber explores trade co-operation with Burkina Faso
description:
Qatar Chamber acting general manager Ali Bu Sherbak al-Mansouri held a meeting yesterday with a trade delegation from Burkina Faso at the chamber’s Lusail headquarters.

title: Support-led reforms to gradually formalise informal trade crucial – GSS
description:
Business News of Thursday, 20 November 2025

Source: thebftonline.com
